author: juanblanco
content: what are your thoughts on 1559 defaults, I am thinking i users don't supply the gas price, it will automatically default to 1559

author: sky.cactus
content: Definitely recommend defaulting to 1559.  Base fee should be latest block base fee times 2 or something, and gas premium I recommend setting at 1 or 2 with launch, and then adjusting based on what we find miners using going forward from there.

author: juanblanco
content: <@!301186049323958275> Thanks! Yes I am following that formula you provided. It can be changed as a different pricing strategy.

author: zsfelfoldi
content: `eth_feeHistory` has been merged to Geth master branch
